scripts.rm-node-module: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.garba-cart: yarn cp-norma-template && yarn run norma-garba && npm-run-all --parallel client build server-dev
scripts.compu-cart: yarn cp-norma-template && yarn run norma-compumundo && npm-run-all --parallel client build server-dev
scripts.empresa-cart: yarn cp-norma-template && yarn run norma-empresarias && npm-run-all --parallel client build server-dev
